issue.title: [Python] Upgrade OpenSSL version in manylinux1 image to 1.1.1b
issue.body:

### Original Issue Description:
See discussion in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4594#discussion_r294778800

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5642?focusedCommentId=16869032) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I think leaving at 1.0.2 for now is OK

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5642?focusedCommentId=16932585) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
The manylinux2010 scripts are using 1.1.1c, the manylinux1 ones are on 1.0.2s (OpenSSL 1.1.1 needs Perl 5.10 to compile, which isn't easily available on the build system).
